content: Whenever filling out surveys I always try to be clever and funny, maybe sneak in an idiomatic expression, a pun or similar, thinking "The person reading this will certainly get a laugh out of this one!". Well, having actually done some translation work for the Rust 2019 survey, I want to go back in time and give myself a rather stern talking to. From now on, all my replies in surveys will be deliberately formed to be easy to translate. :neutral:
